alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Ellis; Hill; Johnson; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Somervell, southern Johnson, Bosque, Hill and southwestern Ellis Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from near Maypearl to near Blum to 7 miles south of Glen Rose. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midlothian, Hillsboro, Clifton, Whitney, Italy, Itasca, Grandview, Meridian, Laguna Park, Valley Mills, Maypearl, Blum, Iredell, Covington, Bynum, Carl`s Corner, Meridian State Park, Aquilla Lake, Lake Whitney State Park, and Lake Whitney. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 355 and 369. Interstate 35W between mile markers 1 and 18. Interstate 35E between mile markers 371 and 388. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
